BdE ggplot2 theme

Source: R/theme_tidybde.R
theme_tidybde.Rd

A custom ggplot2 theme based on the publications of BdE.

theme_tidybde(...)

Arguments

...

Arguments passed on to ggplot2::theme_classic

base_size

base font size, given in pts.

base_family

base font family

base_line_size

base size for line elements

base_rect_size

base size for rect elements

Value

A ggplot2

theme().

Details

Theme based on ggplot2::theme_classic().

See also

ggplot2::theme_classic()

Other bde_plot: bde_tidy_palettes(), scales_bde

Examples

# \donttest{
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(tidyr)

series_TC <- bde_series_full_load("TC_1_1.csv")

# If download was OK then plot
if (nrow(series_TC) > 0) {
  series_TC <- series_TC[c(1, 2)]

  series_TC_pivot <- series_TC %>%
    filter(
      Date >= "2020-01-01" & Date <= "2020-12-31",
      !is.na(series_TC[[2]])
    )

  names(series_TC_pivot) <- c("x", "y")

  ggplot(series_TC_pivot, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
    geom_line(linewidth = 0.8, color = bde_tidy_palettes(n = 1)) +
    labs(
      title = "Title",
      subtitle = "Some metric",
      caption = "Bank of Spain"
    ) +
    theme_tidybde()
}

# }

About tidyBdE

Developed by Diego H. Herrero.

Part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.8.

Template rostemplate by dieghernan, based on Bootstrapious.
